title: And Both Were Young
description: In this novel by A Wrinkle in Time author Madeleine L'Engle, Philippa is miserable at an all girls' boarding school in Switzerland . . . until she meets the mysterious Paul.Flip feels miserable when she first arrives at boarding school in Switzerland. Then she finds a true friend in Paul.
